member.name: RAWINPUT
member.summary: Contains the raw input from a device.

member.name: RAWINPUT.data.mouse
member.summary: If the data comes from a mouse, this is the raw input data.

member.name: RAWINPUT.data.keyboard
member.summary: If the data comes from a keyboard, this is the raw input data.

member.name: RAWINPUT.data.hid
member.summary: If the data comes from an HID, this is the raw input data.
